user_profile.name: Rajesh Kumar
user_profile.description: Rajesh is a 40-year-old professional from an Eastern cultural background, who has a friendly demeanor yet communicates in a very reserved and concise manner. With intermediate tech experience, he is cautiously approaching the task of arranging home modifications for the elderly, motivated by a desire to ensure their comfort and safety, especially as he has limited previous experience in this area but understands its urgency in a professional office setting.

instructions.dialogue: Share your needs and preferences clearly.
instructions.profile: Reveal all your profile information naturally in the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express strong emotions and clear intentions in your inner thoughts.

priority_features: Safety enhancements (e.g., grab bars, non-slip flooring)
usage_scenarios: Daily living activities for elderly persons with limited mobility
Hosting family gatherings with elderly family members
Ensuring a safe environment for visiting caregivers
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local home improvement store or online retailers

examples: I'm looking for a 5G smartphone under $800 with at least 8GB RAM, excellent camera quality, and all-day battery life since I travel frequently for work and need to take lots of photos.
I need a gaming laptop with an RTX 3070 or better GPU, 32GB RAM, and a 144Hz display that can handle modern AAA titles at high settings while staying cool during extended sessions.
I want a smart home security system that includes doorbell camera, 4 outdoor cameras, motion sensors, and integrates with Google Home since we have a large property and travel frequently.
